comment: [MODIFIED]: renamed from `CONTIGNAME` - chromosome where the variant is located
starting position of the variant
end position of the variant
reference letter of the variant
alternative letter found for this variant
[ADDED]: union of `clin_sig` and `clin_sig_conflict`
variant name
[MODIFIED]: renamed from `CLNSIG` - Clinical significance for this single variant
[MODIFIED]: renamed from `CLNSIGCONF` - Conflicting clinical significance for this single variant
allele frequencies from ExAC
Sequence Ontology id for variant type
Gene(s) for the variant reported as gene symbol:gene id. The gene symbol and id are delimited by a colon (:) and each pair is delimited by a vertical bar (|)
Clinical significance for a haplotype or genotype that includes this variant. Reported as pairs of VariationID:clinical significance.
the variant clinical sources reported as tag-value pairs of database and variant identifier
Tag-value pairs of disease database name and identifier, e.g. OMIM:NNNNNN
ClinVar review status for the Variation ID
the ClinVar Allele ID

Allele origin code. 0 - unknown; 1 - germline; 2 - somatic; 4 - inherited; 8 - paternal; 16 - maternal; 32 - de-novo; 64 - biparental; 128 - uniparental; 256 - not-tested; 512 - tested-inconclusive; 1073741824 - other
Variant Suspect Reason Codes. 0 - unspecified, 1 - Paralog, 2 - byEST, 4 - oldAlign, 8 - Para_EST, 16 - 1kg_failed, 1024 - other
For included Variant : Preferred disease name for the concept specified by disease identifiers in CLNDISDB
dbSNP ID (i.e. rs number)
Gene(s) for the variant reported as gene symbol:gene id. The gene symbol and id are delimited by a colon (:) and each pair is delimited by a vertical bar (|)
allele frequencies from TGP
Variant type
Top-level (primary assembly, alt, or patch) HGVS expression.
comma separated list of molecular consequence in the form of Sequence Ontology ID|molecular_consequence
allele frequencies from GO-ESP
For included Variant: Tag-value pairs of disease database name and identifier, e.g. OMIM:NNNNNN
[MODIFIED]: renamed from `clndn` - preferred disease name for the concept specified by disease identifiers in CLNDISDB.
[ADDED]: calculated from `origin` - list of all origins as human-readable label.
